queries.name: SignIn_SignUp_Bonus
queries.query: select * from ( select trunc(logtime) datetime, sum(totalrequest) total from tblapilogsummery where applicationname='APIHUB2' and method like '%processbonus%' group by trunc(logtime) order by 1 desc) where datetime !=trunc(sysdate) and rownum<= 7
